author: Shirmy Chan
description: Sadly, there are few contemporary cocktails using crème de menthe, but this refreshing gin-laced, apple and mint cocktail is one of the stand-out exceptions.
name: Envy Smith
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass
